## LogEntry type

A single logging event.

Each message has its own instance of this, with relevant data attached.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LogEntry = {
    level: LogLevel;
    message: string;
    data: LogData;
    metadata: LogMetadata;
};
```
**References:** [LogLevel](./rlog.loglevel.md)<!-- -->, [LogData](./rlog.logdata.md)<!-- -->, [LogMetadata](./rlog.logmetadata.md)
